options.blogdescription: Welcome to your WordPress for Teams site!

content.post_content:
This is your brand new team site. ✨

You can post updates and invite others to contribute â€” keep conversations private, or make your site public for everyone. No more losing conversations and important documents inside email threads.

Bring your team in

Coworkers, clients, family members... You decide what your team is! 🙌

Just go to the People area in the site management section to invite them. Their picture will appear on the sidebar once they join.

Your first post

Use the editor located at the top of the Home section to compose and publish your updates.

The editor uses blocks, individual pieces of content that you can combine to create anything you want. Paragraphs, quotes, images (or galleries!), snippets of code, embedded content from other sites... This site uses WordPress so it takes advantage of its incredible ecosystem.

Just type / or click on the + icon to see a list of blocks. Give it a try!

More tips

  • Comments also use blocks. 💬
  • Once your teammates are here, you can mention them using the @ character followed by their username. They'll receive a notification so they don't miss it!
  • Visit My profile to update your name or upload a new profile picture.
  • Check your site settings. Confirm your site's time zone or its privacy settings in the Site settings section.
  • See the "Follow" button at the bottom of this post? You can click it on any post to receive an email every time a new comment is posted.

Links

  • Download the apps
